Game.plot: Pok?mon LeafGreen takes the player into the world of Kanto on a mission to catch all more than 150 Pok?mon for Pok?mon researcher Prof. Oak. Pok?mon are animal-like creatures with strange powers that inhabit every nook and cranny of the Pok?mon world. Try to capture them all using Pok? Balls, create your own personal team of Pok?mon, and prepare them for for the ultimate battle with the Elite Four!It is a remake of the original Pok?mon Green (which was sold in other territories with some graphical and gameplay improvements as Pok?mon Blue) and offers the same diversity of gameplay as the original. However, this game's got everything you might miss in the classic game: updated art, splendid graphics, new Pok?mon and perhaps the most interesting, the wireless adapter. This allows you to wirelessly trade with your friends within a limited radius. In addition, LeafGreen lets you explore a new set of islands outside of Kanto, the Sevii Islands!
